text: My back of the envelope calculation for Canada based on publicly confirmed #COVID19 #vaccine orders so far using public prices: 20M Pfizer x USD$19.5 + 40M Moderna x USD$35 + 20M AstraZeneca x USD$3.5 = USD$1.86B minimum not including options and other vaccines still in trials. https://t.co/UHnvCmYKQW
